attributes.action: Announce a National Tree Planting Day.
attributes.additional_details: A small gesture that would create a huge difference to the environment. Clean air, green spaces and wildlife. Imagine if the idea spread around the world. Would help reduce global warming and pollution with very little effort.
attributes.background: If a tree was planted for every person in the UK, in a garden, in a field, on wasteland or in a pot, we could have millions of new trees in the UK each year, creating cleaner air and a greener environment. Imagine the potential global benefit if the idea spread.
